Contact: ^This morning, a couple of nasty orcs stole my candy! I think I saw them pack it away in their dirty old chest up the path! By chance, have you come across my candy?
Idle: ^Come back if you find my Candy!
Completion: ^Please take this reward as a token of my gratitude!
PostCompletion: ^Thanks for reuniting me with my candy!
^I think I heard some rumblings over in that old cave...
